name: UnilateralMastectomyLeft
title: Unilateral Mastectomy Left
description: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains concepts that represent unilateral mastectomy of the right breast.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use the Quality Data Model (QDM) datatype related to Procedure, Performed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes only relevant concepts associated  with a unilateral mastectomy of the right breast. This is a grouping value set of SNOMEDCT and ICD10PCS codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes concepts that pertain to a left, right or bilateral mastectomy.)

concept.display: Resection of Left Breast, Open Approach
Postmastectomy lymphedema syndrome of left upper limb (disorder)
History of prophylactic mastectomy of left breast (situation)
Modified radical mastectomy of left breast (procedure)
